thread.title: Cheekati Rajyam song unveiled
thread.title_full: Cheekati Rajyam song unveiled - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Cheekati Rajyam song unveiled
text: Kamal Haasan starrer Cheekati Rajyam is getting ready to hit the screens on November 10th. The post production work is on the verge of completion. As per the latest update, a song from the film has been unveiled on October 7t. Ghibran is the music director for the film. Directed by Rajesh M Selva, the film has Trisha Krishnan as the female lead. Prakash Raj and Madhu Shalini are essaying prominent roles in the film. Raaj Kamal Films International is the production unit behind this bilingual thriller.
